game.name: Supermarket Mania
game.description:
Running a grocery chain can always be a daunting task! If you also want to have this experience in your life, give this brand new free online give a try. Supermarket Mania is a wonderfully-designed, highly addictive girl game where you have to manage a number of things to ensure your win in the end. Join the community of players who love to shop for their necessary items during the spare time! It will be amazing to see how quickly you can organize plenty of things. This challenging online game will also put your time management skill to test.

In this one of the best shopping games for girls, you also have to take care of the items that you can add to your shopping list. Begin your shopping with the selection of items from the checklist! Feel free to choose from the fruits, vegetables, drinks, toys, clothes and more. Once it’s done, you have to pay the money for all the items you have purchased at the cash counter. Remember, a message ‘Go back to shopping, there are still some useful items on the list’ will be displayed on the screen if you forget to add some necessary daily items to your list. 

You have the ability to take care of a number of unique stores through multiple challenging yet exciting levels. Get yourself equipped to tackle different quests to collect some respected rewards and achievements! This game is free to play and allows you to unlock countless bonuses. We at our website maintain multiple cool HTML5 shopping games for kids. Keep checking them out one by one to provide yourself with an immersive gaming experience!
